desc: The Wool Queen sells knitting and crochet yarn and wool, needles, hooks and accessories. Shop fibers including acrylic, baby alpaca, cashmere, cotton, wool and merino from Araucania, Ella Rae, Gedifra, James C Brett, Juniper Moon, KFI Luxury, King Cole, Knitting Fever, Louisa Harding, Patons and Queensland Collection.

layout.text: "Knitting, he thought, was a comfort to the soul. It was regular. It was repetitious. And, in the end, it amounted to something." - Jan Karon, 'At Home In Mitford'
